game.name: Zodiac Legion
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 창작마당, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Zodiac Legion is a turn-based tactical RPG where you take command of an arcane chivalric order. Expand your potential in a world of reawakening magic. Develop your stronghold, research astral powers, and lead your champions in combat against forces and beasts from beyond myth and memory.
